00081 #ifndef VLIB_ORB_H
00082 #define VLIB_ORB_H 1
00083 
00084 #include "VLIB_types.h"
00085 
00086 #define CORB_MAX_FEATURES 10000
00087 
00088 #define CORB_MAX_IMAGE_WIDTH 10000
00089 #define CORB_MIN_IMAGE_WIDTH 120
00090 #define CORB_MIN_IMAGE_HEIGHT 120
00091 #define CORB_IMAGE_WIDTH_MULTIPLE 8
00092 #define CORB_IMAGE_HEIGHT_MULTIPLE 8
00093 
00094 #define CORB_NUM_OFAST_OFFSETS (8 * CORB_HALF_PATCH_SIZE)
00095 
00096 #define CORB_PATCH_SIZE 31
00097 #define CORB_HALF_PATCH_SIZE (CORB_PATCH_SIZE / 2)
00098 
00099 #define CORB_NUM_PATTERNS 256
00100 
00101 #define CORB_NUM_ORIENTATIONS 30
00102 
00103 #define CORB_PATCH_KERNEL_WIDTH 5
00104 #define CORB_PATCH_KERNEL_HALF_WIDTH (CORB_PATCH_KERNEL_WIDTH / 2)
00105 
00106 #define Compare(X, Y) ((X) >= (Y))
00107 
00108 #ifndef MAX
00109 #define MAX(a, b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))
00110 #endif
00111 
00112 #ifndef MIN
00113 #define MIN(a, b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))
00114 #endif
00115 
00116 /* Round up the number to the nearest 4 (useful for pointers) */
00117 #ifndef ALIGN4
00118 #define ALIGN4(x) (((x) + 3) & (~3u))
00119 #endif
00120 
00121 #ifndef DWORD_ALIGNED
00122 #define DWORD_ALIGNED(x) (_nassert(((int32_t)(x) & 0x7) == 0))
00123 #endif
00124 
00125 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00126 #ifndef restrict
00127 /* #define restrict __restrict */
00128 #define restrict /* Blank, because correctness is more important than speed on the PC */
00129 #endif
00130 
00131 #ifndef snprintf
00132 #define snprintf sprintf_s
00133 #endif
00134 
00135 #ifndef inline
00136 #define inline __inline
00137 #endif
00138 
00139 #endif
00140 
00141 #if !defined(CORB_Bool) && !defined(BOOL_FALSE) && !defined(BOOL_TRUE)
00142 typedef enum {
00143     BOOL_FALSE = 0,
00144     BOOL_TRUE = 1
00145 }CORB_Bool;
00146 #endif
00147 
00148 #ifdef __cplusplus
00149 extern "C" {
00150 #endif
00151 
00152 #if 0 /* Not needed by VLIB library, required at higher level abstraction */
00153 typedef enum {
00154     FAST_9,
00155     FAST_9_ACCELERATED,
00156     FAST_12,
00157     FAST_12_ACCELERATED
00158 }FastKeypointVersion;
00159 #endif
00160 
00161 typedef enum {
00162     CORB_OK  = 0,
00163     CORB_FAIL = -1
00164 }CORBResult;
00165 
00169 typedef struct {
00170     int32_t width;                       
00171     int32_t height;                      
00172     int32_t marginPixels;                
00174     uint8_t fastDifferenceThreshold;     
00175     /*        FastKeypointVersion fastVersion; Which version of fast to use. FAST_9 is the value for the original ORB. */
00176     /*        CORB_Bool useFastNonMaxSupression; Should the detected FAST features be non-maxima supressed? For the original ORB, this is BOOL_TRUE. */
00177     /*        int16_t harrisK;  (SQ0.15) The k-parameter for Harris. A reasonable value is 1311 (which is equal to 0.04f * powf(2.0f,15.0f)) */
00178     int32_t n_features_desired;          
00179 }CORBParameters;
00180 
00184 typedef struct {
00185     int32_t octave;     
00186     /* TODO: change to int8_t or S16, if possible */
00187     int32_t relative_patterns[CORB_NUM_ORIENTATIONS][CORB_NUM_PATTERNS * 8];
00188     int32_t rotated_patterns[CORB_NUM_ORIENTATIONS][CORB_NUM_PATTERNS * 4];
00189     int32_t integralImageWidth;
00190 }CORBPatterns;
00191 
00195 typedef struct {
00196     int32_t orientation_horizontal_offsets[CORB_NUM_OFAST_OFFSETS];
00197     int32_t orientation_vertical_offsets[CORB_NUM_OFAST_OFFSETS];
00198     int32_t u_max[CORB_HALF_PATCH_SIZE + 1];
00199 }CORBOrientationOffsets;
00200 
00204 typedef struct {
00205     CORBPatterns           patterns; 
00206     CORBOrientationOffsets offsets;  
00207     uint8_t               *image;        
00208     uint8_t               *prefimage;    
00209     int16_t               *harrisImage;  
00210     uint32_t              *integralImage; 
00211     char                  *scratchBuffer; 
00212     int8_t                *orbPattern31; 
00213 }CORBInput;
00214 
00215 
00219 typedef struct {
00220     int32_t x;                                 
00222     int32_t y;                                 
00224     int32_t octave;                            
00227     VLIB_F32 angle;                              /*TODO: make integer (or fixed point) */
00228     int32_t  fastResponse;                     
00229     int16_t  harrisResponse;                   
00230     uint8_t  descriptor[CORB_NUM_PATTERNS / 8]; 
00231 }CORBFeature;
00232 
00236 typedef struct {
00237     CORBFeature *features;     
00238     int32_t      n_features;       
00239 }CORBOutput;
00240 
00241 #ifdef __cplusplus
00242 }
00243 #endif

00247 #endif /* define VLIB_ORB_H */
